thread.title: MedWand Digital Health and Doctor On Demand Team Up to Improve Patient Care, Anywhere
thread.title_full: MedWand Digital Health and Doctor On Demand Team Up to Improve Patient Care, Anywhere

author: Samir Qamar, President
title: MedWand Digital Health and Doctor On Demand Team Up to Improve Patient Care, Anywhere
text:
MedWand today announced its partnership with Doctor On Demand as MedWand’s preferred telemedicine provider. The collaboration allows MedWand to add the leading, next generation video telemedicine company to its national distribution, and allows Doctor On Demand patients to receive MedWand-enabled real-time remote physical exams. The two companies plan to market their respective telemedicine services together. In addition, MedWand plans to bundle its telemedicine technology with Doctor On Demand services for national distribution.
MedWand Founder and CEO, Dr. Samir Qamar, is excited at the opportunity that’s been formed. “We’re fans of the approach, innovation, and tech-friendliness at Doctor On Demand. Their excellent telemedicine service combined with MedWand’s examination capabilities will take the telemedicine industry to a new high. We’re thrilled.”
MedWand investor and senior advisor, Praveen Mooganur, agrees. “MedWand and Doctor On Demand are a great fit for each other. One provides enhanced telemedicine physical exams, the other physician-directed telemedicine services. It’s a great match, and both our clients will immediately see the value. I am specifically excited about MedWand Digital Onsite Clinics (DOC) that employers will be able to use to offer convenient care to employees at work.”
Doctor On Demand co-founder and CEO Adam Jackson comments, “Doctor On Demand is excited to partner with MedWand as their preferred video telemedicine provider. We built Doctor On Demand to improve access to top physicians in the country, and MedWand’s remote examination device will further expand the type of care we can provide to our patients. We’re excited about our future together.”
MedWand Digital Health recently made headlines in Silicon Valley when it won the 2015 Health 2.0 coveted Launch! award after a live demonstration of its technology. MedWand allows patients to receive real-time physical exams in conjunction with telemedicine video services over the Internet. MedWand has also been cited by Frost & Sullivan as one of the top ten healthcare disrupters of the year.
About MedWand Digital Health
United States-based MedWand Solutions, Inc. creates MedWand telemedicine technology, allowing telemedicine providers to perform remote physical examinations in real-time. With offices in Nevada and California, MedWand’s mission is to add medical data collection to telemedicine via innovative technology. Designed to be used by patients and doctors together, the MedWand device is portable, and combines a digital stethoscope, high-definition video camera for looking at skin and inside passages, thermometer, pulse oximetry, heart rate monitor, EKG, and Bluetooth for peripheral device data. MedWand DOCs (Digital Onsite Clinics) combine MedWand devices with computers and tablets to create cost-effective virtual clinic capabilities for access to care via Internet or satellite links. For more information, visit http://www.MedWand.com , or follow on Twitter @MedWand.
About Doctor On Demand
Doctor On Demand provides Video Visits with Board Certified Physicians, Psychologists, and Lactation Consultants via smartphones, tablets, and computers. Patients simply download the Doctor On Demand app or visit http://www.doctorondemand.com , provide a list of their symptoms, and are instantly connected for a Video Visit. Doctor On Demand’s unique offering for health plans and employers combines a $0 PEPM business model with the easiest to use, highest-rated consumer application in the telemedicine space. Doctor On Demand has more 5 star App Store reviews than every other telemedicine app combined. To learn more, please visit http://www.doctorondemand.com .
